text: Akho, ki usa nu pukaro jinham nu tusim alaha tom thil'ham pujanayoga samajha rakhi'a hai. Uha na akasam ate na dharati ate na inham dauvam de vicakara ika (dhura de) kana barabara vi adhikara nahim rakhade ate na hi inham vica unham di ko'i bha'ivali hai. Ate na inham vica unham da ko'i saha'ika hai
